hero_description: A production-ready starter with SSR auth, i18n, and deployment config out of the box.
screenshot_caption: A minimal protected page you can extend
features_desc_1: Email/password and Google sign-in with SSR-aware sessions.
features_desc_2: File-based routing with client-side data fetching patterns.
features_desc_3: Message-based translations with a cookie-driven locale strategy.
features_desc_4: Dockerfile + fly.toml configured for easy deployment.
faq_a1: Supabase auth, TanStack Router + Query, Paraglide i18n, and Fly.io deployment config.
faq_a2: Yes. Routes under the layout are gated by SSR auth in beforeLoad.
faq_q3: Where do I add my own business logic?
faq_a3: Add new routes under src/routes and server functions under src/lib/server or src/lib/dashboard.
faq_q4: Does it ship with a database table example?
faq_a4: Yes. It includes a minimal profiles table with RLS and a sample RPC.
signin_description: Sign in with email/password or Google.
signin_cancelled: Google sign-in was cancelled or failed. Please try again.
signup_description: Sign up with email/password or Google.
signup_check_email: Check your email to confirm your account.
dashboard_description: A minimal protected page with example RPC + Query.
not_found_message: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist.
